post.text: Crooked Hillary counts on Wall Street for donations.  I'll NEVER be bought and sold by them. My supporters are the BEST because they're every day Americans! Together, we WILL Make America Great Again!

comment.author: James
comment.text: Mr Trump you have got to stop letting Hillary gigging you into saying stupid things,pleas e think first because the media along with her will make such a big deal out of anything you say,you may not mean anything by it like saying what you did about Putin and the emails,boy did they have a field day with that one ,also replying to the muslim and his wife,you really should have just left that one alone,he is one of her brotherhood so you know he knows how to play on words..If she wins this election we are doomed so please be careful what you say and stop with the name calling it isnt very presidential.

replies.author: Alycia
replies.text: "Scare" might not exist in his world. He is the supreme leader. They WILL twist his words no matter what, every single day. So why bother?
